BBVAEURA.MX.short_name: BBVA BANCOMER GESTION SA FD BBV
BBVAEURA.MX.long_name: Fondo BBVA Bancomer Deuda InversiÃ³n en Moneda Extranjera SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
BBVAEURA.MX.summary: The objective is to provide investors BBVAEUR coverage of the Mexican peso against the euro, in a portfolio comprising debt investment assets denominated mainly in euros by bank deposits of money to look at financial institutions, including foreign and securities issued or guaranteed by the Federal Government, the Bank of Mexico, state and municipal governments, and corporate credit institutions, domestic and foreign, live or repo. The Fund also may invest in financial derivative instruments recognized market under the provisions issued after the CNBV and Banco de Mexico, denominated in local currency and / or foreign. The fund will have an investment strategy of short-term, seeking to capitalize on market movements.
BBVAEURA.MX.family: BBVA Bancomer GestiÃ³n SA de CV

NTEEUROA.MX.long_name: Fondo Banorte Ixe 21, S.A. de C.V., F.I.I.D. A
NTEEUROA.MX.summary: The main objective of IXEEURO will be the offer a portfolio mainly consisting of international securities and investment companies denominated or linked to the euro short-term and, in a smaller proportion of medium and long term. IXEEURO may make for the purposes of coverage and speculation operations with derivative instruments. The main risk will be when positive variations arise where the weight is weak with respect to that currency, and vice versa.
NTEEUROA.MX.family: Fondos Banorte IXE SA de CV
